summary.Title: Pharmacovigilance Physician
summary.Presentation:
NQR is looking for an experienced Pharmacovigilance Physician for KLIFO
 
KLIFO is expanding their office in Denmark and wants to engage a Pharmacovigilance Physician

WorkPlace.Name: SCANPEOPLE ApS
WorkPlace.Description:
ScanPeople er et ungt og dynamisk dansk ejet selskab i Scanavo Gruppen.

Vores succes som servicevirksomhed afhænger af et godt og effektivt samspil mellem os, vores kunder og vores kandidater. Vi besidder et vidtrækkende netværk og suppleret med en god solid teoretisk og faglig baggrund, sikrer vi den bedste service og kvalitet til alle, vi er i berøring med.
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription:
ScanPeople er en solid og dynamisk danskejet virksomhed i Scanavo gruppen. Vi er yderst servicemindede og kompetente rådgivere. En af ScanPeoples store styrker er medarbejdernes meget forskelligartede baggrunde. Vi besidder et vidtrækkende rekrutteringsnetværk og en bred erfaring med vikarassistance, search, rekruttering, interim management og outplacement. 


Yderligere information findes på www.scanpeople.dk

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
NQR is looking for an experienced Pharmacovigilance Physician for KLIFO

 

KLIFO is expanding their office in Denmark and wants to engage a Pharmacovigilance Physician into a dynamic and experienced team. 

If you would like to work in a consulting environment and have a positive, proactive and self-confident personality we would like to hear from you. 

KLIFO can offer a highly flexible and trustful working climate with exciting customers and projects among competent colleagues where your knowledge, experience and contribution are valuable and highly appreciated.

The position as Pharmacovigilance Physician:

KLIFO works with all aspects of drug safety and pharmacovigilance and the work involves collaboration and execution of projects according to their client’s needs. 

As Pharmacovigilance Physician you will be responsible for the medical review and ensure appropriateness of medical content in the work they do.

KLIFO's services include:

  • Set up of trial related activities (Safety Management Plans, Medical Monitoring Plans, input to protocols and Investigators Brochure and Reference Safety Information) and establishing activities for Safety Committees and Data Monitoring Boards
  • Safety handling in clinical trials (SAE handling and reporting, safety surveillance, signal detection, medical monitoring, preparation of DSUR) and support to clinical submissions
  • For established products: Case handling and reporting, writing aggregated reports, answering authority questions, support update of labels/CCSI and Risk Management Plans

The qualifications of the Pharmacovigilance Physician:

  • Medical physician or veterinarian
  • A minimum of 4 years in a similar position in the pharmaceutical industry/biotech or at CRO
  • Knowledge of international pharmacovigilance regulations and guidelines
  • Knowledge of GCP and clinical trial processes
  • Ability to translate client’s needs into a solid plan
  • Excellent English communication skills
  • Microsoft office skills

KLIFO offer:

  • Work within different therapeutic areas and with tasks of varying complexity
  • Work with a heterogeneous client pool (pharmaceutical companies, biotech, investigators and academia)
  • Use and elaborate your competences and experience
  • Work in an interactive, flexible and positive working environment
  • Collaborate with a team of dedicated and experienced colleagues

Location:

KLIFO has offices in Denmark, Germany, Sweden and The Netherlands. This position is located at our office in Glostrup, Denmark
